uk.ac.diamond.powder_toolkit.dataAnalysis

Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.diamond.powder_toolkit.dataAnalysis.Loader

  • public class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loader Class designed to load in the data easily, it uses loader factory and a makes basic decisions about the files (is it a .nxs) for example
    Author:
    sfz19839
